Package com.hexaware.dao

Class CartDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.CartDao
public class CartDao extends Object
The CartDao class provides methods to perform database operations related to cart entities.

  • Constructor Details

    • CartDao

      public CartDao()

  • Method Details

    • addToCart

      public boolean addToCart(Cart cartItem) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Adds an item to the cart.
      Parameters:
      cartItem - the Cart object containing item details
      Returns:
      true if the item is successfully added to the cart, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if the product is not found

    • updateCartItem

      public void updateCartItem(int uid, int pid, int qChange) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Updates the quantity of a cart item.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user ID
      pid - the product ID
      qChange - the quantity change (can be positive or negative)
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if the product is not found

    • removeFromCart

      public void removeFromCart(int uid, int pid) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Removes an item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user ID
      pid - the product ID to be removed from the cart
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if the product is not found in the cart

    • ClearAll

      public void ClearAll(int uid)
      Clears the entire cart for a given user.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user ID whose cart is to be cleared

    • getFromCartDb

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getFromCartDb(int customerId)
      Retrieves the items in the cart for a given user.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the user ID
      Returns:
      a map containing the product IDs and their corresponding quantities in the cart
